hero.description: The smart exchange platform that connects people across Europe. Swap your unused items for things you actually want.

features.title: Everything You Need to Trade
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to make swapping simple, safe, and enjoyable.

smartMatching.title: Smart Matching
smartMatching.description: Our AI-powered algorithm finds the perfect swap opportunities based on your preferences and trading history.

nearbySwaps.title: Nearby Swaps
nearbySwaps.description: Discover items from users in your area. Meet locally or ship across Europe with ease.

secureTrading.title: Secure Trading
secureTrading.description: Verified profiles, ratings, and secure messaging ensure safe and trustworthy exchanges.
secureTrading.feature1Desc: All users go through a verification process to ensure safe and trustworthy exchanges.
secureTrading.feature2Desc: End-to-end encrypted messaging keeps your conversations private and secure.

realTimeChat.title: Real-Time Chat
realTimeChat.description: Negotiate, plan meetups, and finalize deals with our instant messaging system.

instantNotifications.title: Lightning Fast
instantNotifications.description: Never miss a match or message with real-time push notifications.
instantNotifications.feature1Desc: Get matched with compatible traders in seconds, not hours.
instantNotifications.feature2Desc: See new items and matches as they happen with live updates.

proBoost.title: Pro Boost
proBoost.description: Upgrade to Pro for unlimited swipes, priority matching, and a verified badge.

testimonials.title: Users Love Us
testimonials.quote1: Valexo changed how I think about trading. Found amazing swaps in my neighborhood I never knew existed!
testimonials.quote2: The matching algorithm is incredible. I've completed over 20 successful trades in just two months.
testimonials.quote3: Finally, a trading app that actually works. Simple, secure, and super fast. Highly recommend!

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Start trading in three simple steps

step1.title: List Your Items
step1.description: Take photos of items you want to trade. Add details and set your swap preferences.

step2.title: Swipe & Match
step2.description: Browse nearby items, swipe right on what you love. When both parties like each other's items, it's a match!

step3.title: Meet & Swap
step3.description: Chat with your match, arrange a meetup, and complete the trade. Rate your experience!

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more power

discover.title: Discover
discover.noMoreMatches: No more matches for this item
discover.noMoreDescription: You've seen all available swaps. Try selecting a different item or check back later for new listings.
discover.addFirstItemDescription: You need to add an item before you can start swiping!
discover.selectItemDescription: Choose one of your items above to find potential swaps

matches.title: Matches
matches.noActiveMatchesDescription: When you match with someone, they'll appear here
matches.noDealInvitesDescription: Deal invites you send or receive will appear here
matches.noMissedMatchesDescription: When someone likes your item but you passed, they'll appear here

items.title: My Items
items.noItemsDescription: Add your first item to start swapping!
items.noActiveItemsDescription: Add your first item to start swapping with others!
items.noSwappedItemsDescription: Items that you've successfully swapped will appear here.
items.itemWasSwapped: This item was swapped and is no longer available.
items.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the item and remove all related matches.

newItem.photoLimit: Add up to 4 photos ‚Ä¢ Max 5MB each

newItem.valueHelp: Help others understand the value of your item
newItem.whatLookingFor: What would you like in exchange?
newItem.preferencesHelp: Select all categories you would accept
newItem.itemLive: Your item is now live and ready to be swapped

search.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters

chat.startConversationDescription: Say hi and discuss the swap details. You can share photos, negotiate, and plan the exchange.

settings.title: Settings
settings.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.chooseNotifications: Choose how you want to be notified
settings.matchAlertsDescription: Get notified when you have a new match
settings.profileVisibilityDescription: Allow others to view your profile
settings.showLocationDescription: Display your approximate location on items
settings.deleteAccountWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. This action is permanent.

missedMatch.description: This person liked your item, but you passed on theirs.
missedMatch.proOnly: Pro members can see who liked them
